sourcesContent:
<form (submit)="onaddpost(addPost)" #addPost="ngForm">

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredTitle"
    placeholder="Title"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredTitle="ngModel"/>

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredDescription"
    placeholder="Description"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredDescription="ngModel"/>

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredDepartments"
    placeholder="Departments"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredDepartments="ngModel"/>

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredProgress"
    placeholder="Progress Status"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredProgress="ngModel"/>

    <button type="submit">Add Post</button>
</form>
